UnactiveUserTip: User is not activated or is not allowed to login
SignupNotOpenTip: Administrator has not opened public signup
UnsetEmailTip: If you forgot or unfilled email, please contact your administrator to reset your password
VcodeEmailSent: Verification code has been sent to your mailbox
EmailAccountUnset: Mail service account is not configured, please contact administrator to configure
YourVcodeForResetPassword: Your reset password verification code is : %s
AdminReviewSignup: Your administrator is reviewing your signup information
YourVcodeForSignup: Your signup email verification code is : %s
SignupPending: %s Welcome to signup! The following is your login information, please keep it safe! [][]Username : %s []Password : %s []Login URL : [%s](%s) [][]You cannot login to the system at this time because the administrator is reviewing your signup information. You will be notified by email after completion, please be patient.
AdminWillReviewSignupTip: The administrator will review your signup information, please enter carefully
SignupSuccessTip: Signup information has been submitted and the results of the review will be notified to you via email
SystemBusy: System is busy, please try again later
UnsupportIE10Tip: Browsers below IE10 are not supported, Chrome, Firefox, Edge or IE11 is recommended
ErrorUnknow: Unknow error, please try again later
Error404: The resource you requested does not exist
NewUserAddedNotify: The system administrator has opened a %s account for you! The following is your login information, please keep it in a safe place. [][]Username : %s []Login password : %s []Login address [%s](%s) [][]The first time you login, we recommend that you change your login password immediately!
NewUserSignupNotify: User @%s submitted a signup request. Please verify the validity of the user and enable and specify the department and role for the user to login. If this is an invalid application, please ignore it. [Click here to activate](%s)
NewUserAccountActive: %s Your account is activated! Now you can login and use the system. Login address [%s](%s) []For the first time, you are advised to change your password immediately! If you have any login or usage problems, please contact your system administrator.
PasswordLevel1Tip: Password must be at least 6 characters
PasswordLevel2Tip: Password must contain numbers and uppercase and lowercase letters
PasswordLevel3Tip: Password must be at least 8 characters and must contain special characters
